parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can be up to 64 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). For more information, see "How to ensure idempotence".

parameters.name: Constraints
parameters.description:
The constraints of the common parameter. By default, this parameter is null. Valid values:

*   AllowedValues: The value that is allowed for the common parameter. It must be an array string.
*   AllowedPattern: The pattern that is allowed for the common parameter. It must be a regular expression.
*   MinLength: The minimum length of the common parameter.
*   MaxLength: The maximum length of the common parameter.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the common parameter. The description must be 1 to 200 characters in length.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the parameter. The name must be 1 to 200 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). It cannot start with ALIYUN, ACS, ALIBABA, ALICLOUD, or OOS.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The data type of the parameter. Valid values: String and StringList.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: The value of the common parameter. The value must be 1 to 4096 characters in length.
